title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5002 - Credit For Prior/previous Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5002 - Credit For Prior/previous Service

State Regulations
§ 5002.1 - Prior/previous service credit under section 509 of the Education Law or sections 446, 513 and 609 of the Retirement and Social Security Law
§ 5002.2 - Special rules and regulations pertaining to members with a date of membership after June 30, 1973, but before July 27, 1976, interpreting subdivision b of section 446 of the Retirement and Social Security Law
§ 5002.3 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after July 27, 1976, but before September 1, 1983, who are eligible to purchase such service
§ 5002.4 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after September 1, 1983 but before January 1, 2010, who are eligible to purchase such service
§ 5002.5 - Method of payment
§ 5002.6 - Credit for prior service as a CETA employee
§ 5002.7 - Payment for previous service for members with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who are eligible to purchase such service
§ 5002.8 - Payment for previous service for Tier 6 members who are eligible to purchase such service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5002

Statutory authority: Education Law, §509; Retirement and

Social Security Law, §§446, 513, 609; L. 1975, ch. 769

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
